metadata.title: CVE-2019-9942 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A sandbox information disclosure exists in Twig before 1.38.0 and 2.xbefore 2.7.0 because, under some circumstances, it is possible to call the__toString() method on an object even if not allowed by the security policyin place.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9942` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-twig - 2.6.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-twig package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.2-2').
